features.RISAT: 2B is a radar imaging earth observation satellite developed by ISRO. प्रमोचन भार / Launch Mass: 615 Kg मिशन कालावधि / Mission Life : 5 Years प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: PSLV-C46 Mission उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Earth Observation निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Disaster Management System Earth Observation कक्षा का प्रकार / Orbit Type: LEO (Low Earth Orbit) More Details PSLV-C46 Mission Brochure PDF - 7.44 MB Gallery PSLV-C46 Curtain Raiser Video (English) PSLV-C46 Curtain Raiser Video (Hindi) Lift-off and Onboard Camera View of PSLV-C46 / RISAT-2B Launch RISAT-2B
